name: Linea: An innerlight game
description:
Linea is a storyline puzzle game in which you can help the characters by drawing the line to the end of the path of light.

Linea can be used to:
● Relieve stress & relax
● Discover interesting characters
● Enjoy beautifully designed worlds
● Lose yourself in an interesting story
● Challenge yourself


ENJOY LINEA STORY
Linea is a beautiful game all about discovery, where narrative & puzzles meld together. Follow the flow of light & help each character as they journey through their own unique stories. Every puzzle you complete, a new line of dialogue is opened up and the story progresses. Each new story is completely unique from the last, with its own locations, characters and dialogue to explore.
Journey along with us through this series of short challenging puzzle stories.

ADDICTIVE GAME MOBILE
The player must draw a line of light and connect all the pieces of the puzzle together as one. It may sound simple but with additional objectives being added the further you progress, this quickly becomes a challenging game to give you that sense of achievement!
The scenario is so cute and minimalistic that you will love solving the puzzle and the story of the characters.
Beautiful ambiance & music will be with you throughout the whole game. Sit back, put your headphones on and enjoy the wonderful worlds we have created.

LINEA AMAZING CHARACTERS
Each short story will have a handful of unique characters for you to meet. Your goal is to help them progress through their story by solving all of their puzzles. Once the story has completed, jump straight into a new one story with a completely new set of characters & dialogue. Each story may be short but they will take you on an emotional journey of excitement, adventure, love & loss.

FIREFLIES & SECRETS
During your journey, you will discover fireflies scattered all across the puzzles you complete. Collecting these fireflies during gameplay will award you with special collectables. Each collectable comes in the form of a photograph of different locations you’ve previously traveled to. As you collect more fireflies, more and more secrets are revealed within these collected photographs. If you manage to collect all the fireflies in the game, you’ll have yourself an entire gallery of discoveries to show off.

WHY DO YOU HAVE TO PLAY LINEA?
Come join these charming little characters and challenge yourself along the way. These worlds are filled with interesting stories, discoveries and secrets, just waiting to be explored by you!

Have fun with this new title from Infinity Games, an expert in minimal and relaxing gameplay! We look forward to bringing you more and more features in future updates.

Check us out at: https://infinitygames.io
